name: Pos2D
description: The Pos2D class represents a 2D position or point in mathematical space with double-precision X and Y coordinates.
overview:
The `Pos2D` class represents a 2D position or point in mathematical space with double-precision X and Y coordinates. This class provides essential mathematical operations for 2D positioning, including addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, and scaling. It's commonly used for screen coordinates, UI positioning, 2D geometry calculations, and vector operations in JSMacros scripts.

The class is designed to be immutable - all mathematical operations return new `Pos2D` instances rather than modifying the original object.

constructors.description: Creates a new Pos2D instance with the specified coordinates.

methods.name: getX
methods.description: Returns the X coordinate of the position.

methods.name: getY
methods.description: Returns the Y coordinate of the position.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds another Pos2D to this position and returns a new Pos2D.

methods.name: add
methods.description: Adds the specified coordinate values to this position.

methods.name: sub
methods.description: Subtracts another Pos2D from this position and returns a new Pos2D.

methods.name: sub
methods.description: Subtracts the specified coordinate values from this position.

methods.name: multiply
methods.description: Multiplies this position by another Pos2D (component-wise multiplication).

methods.name: multiply
methods.description: Multiplies this position by the specified coordinate values.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The X value to multiply by

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The Y value to multiply by

methods.name: divide
methods.description: Divides this position by another Pos2D (component-wise division).

methods.name: divide
methods.description: Divides this position by the specified coordinate values.

parameters.name: x
parameters.description: The X value to divide by

parameters.name: y
parameters.description: The Y value to divide by

methods.name: scale
methods.description: Multiplies both coordinates by the same scaling factor.
examples:
const pos = new Pos2D(10, 20);
const scaled = pos.scale(2.5); // Pos2D(25, 50)

methods.name: to3D
methods.description: Converts this 2D position to a 3D position by setting Z to 0.
examples:
const pos2D = new Pos2D(100, 200);
const pos3D = pos2D.to3D(); // Pos3D(100, 200, 0)

methods.name: toVector
methods.description: Creates a Vec2D from the origin (0, 0) to this position.
examples:
const pos = new Pos2D(10, 20);
const vector = pos.toVector(); // Vec2D from (0, 0) to (10, 20)

methods.name: toVector
methods.description: Creates a Vec2D from a starting position to this position.

methods.name: toVector
methods.description: Creates a Vec2D from starting coordinates to this position.
examples:
const pos = new Pos2D(15, 25);
const vector = pos.toVector(5, 10); // Vec2D from (5, 10) to (15, 25)

methods.name: toReverseVector
methods.description: Creates a Vec2D from this position to the origin (0, 0).
examples:
const pos = new Pos2D(10, 20);
const vector = pos.toReverseVector(); // Vec2D from (10, 20) to (0, 0)

methods.name: toReverseVector
methods.description: Creates a Vec2D from this position to an ending position.

methods.name: toReverseVector
methods.description: Creates a Vec2D from this position to ending coordinates.
examples:
const pos = new Pos2D(5, 10);
const vector = pos.toReverseVector(15, 25); // Vec2D from (5, 10) to (15, 25)

methods.name: equals
methods.description: Compares this Pos2D with another object for equality.

methods.name: hashCode
methods.description: Returns the hash code for this position.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of this position.
examples:
const pos = new Pos2D(10.5, 20.3);
Chat.log(pos.toString()); // "10.500000, 20.300000"

methods.name: compareTo
methods.description: Compares this Pos2D with another position lexicographically (first by X, then by Y).
